an2.88-97:1: "Bhikkhus, there are these two things. What two? (88) Exertion and non-distraction … (89) Name and form … (90) True knowledge and liberation … (9) The view of existence and the view of extermination … (92) Moral shamelessness and moral recklessness … (93) Moral shame and moral dread … (94) Being difficult to correct and bad friendship … (95) Being easy to correct and good friendship … (96) Skillfulness in the elements and skillfulness in attention …… (97) Skillfulness in regard to offenses and skillfulness in rehabilitation from offenses. These are the two things."
